name: site_versus_site_rpg
description: Site Vs Site RPG is a turn based RPG where the stats of the players are culled from real web site analytics from Google Analytics' API   - Uses Node and MySQL to store site/player data   - Favicons from popular (and not so popular) sites form the basis for the player's in-game icon   - Player class determined by type of web sites chosen as part of one's party
